plugins.name: Ellipse to Rectangle
plugins.description:
Easily convert ellipses to rounded rectangles with this plugin.


How it works

The plugin changes ellipses to rounded rectangles, keeping all properties intact. It processes multiple shapes efficiently and ensures your design files remain clean and organized.


How to use

1. Run the plugin from the Quick Actions or Plugin menu.

2. Select the ellipses you want to convert.

3. The plugin will convert the selected ellipses to rounded rectangles.


The plugin only affects ellipses, leaving other shapes unchanged.
plugins.tagline: Change ellipse shapes to rectangles with same properties

102906.name: Ellipse to Rectangle
102906.description:

plugins.name: Export to Threads
plugins.description:
Tired of hacking together multiple tools to share your work and get feedback on it? Now you can export Figma frames to Threads to share designs with your team, gather feedback in one place, and present your work.


How it works

  1. Download the Mac desktop app and sign into Threads
  2. Go to your organization on the top left of Threads
  3. Use the drop-down and select Integrations
  4. Under Personal Apps find Figma and press Sign in
  5. Follow the set up instructions
  6. Once you're set up, select Figma frames you want to get feedback on, or present, and press cmd+; to run the plugin and send the frames to the Threads desktop app
  7. Add context to the frames, tag your teammates, or add video narration to walk through them


You can also interact with a Figma prototype directly in Threads by copying it and pasting it into a thread.


What is Threads

Threads is a Slack replacement designed for makers. To get early access to Threads, you can sign up here: https://threads.com/


Help articles

  1. How do I install the plugin?
  2. How do I import frames?

plugins.name: Tab Text Override
plugins.description:
Tab through every text override in your selection. Stop mousing around!


How to use: 


  • Select any text element, symbol(s), etc. 
  • Hit Cmd + T
  • Start typing to override first text element within selection.
  • Tab to select the next text element to override, or Shift + Tab to go to previous text element.
  • Enter to save and close.
  • Esc to revert last edited text element and close.


To add a line break, hit Option + Enter.


To buy me a coffee, venmo @dbilyk :)


Hope someone can find this useful!


Note: This plugin currently only works on text elements that have exactly ONE font for all characters in the text element.

accepted.name: Dmitri Bilyk
accepted.description: CXO at an early-stage stealth startup. Building tools for the future of the creator economy.

plugins.name: Glassmorphism Generator - Glass UI Generator
plugins.description:
Glassmorphism UI Generator for Figma


Get multiple licenses ->


Create Glassmorphism style UI element directly in Figma with ease! This plugin empowers you to design stylish, modern surfaces with customizable transparency, blur, and shadow to achieve frosted glass effect.


Key Features:

  1. Settings Control: Adjust blur intensity, transparency, surface color, borders, shadows, and background images.
  2. Live Preview: Instantly see how your design looks across different UI components, like profile cards, dropdown menus, modals, and more.
  3. Auto-Generated CSS: Get the exact CSS code for your design on the fly‚Äîperfect for developers and designers alike.
  4. Insertion: Once you're happy with your design, the plugin inserts an empty Figma frame with your custom styles and background image applied.

accepted.name: Eugenio Ciccale
accepted.description:
I'm a Product Designer & Front-end developer creating Figma Plugins to enhance your creative workflows

https://shop.plusuidesign.com/

plugins.tagline: Create Glassmorphism style UI elements directly in Figma - Glass UI generator

plugins.name: Mosaic & Pixels
plugins.description:
How does it work ?


‚Ä¢ select one shape with an image fill


‚Ä¢ use slider to set sample size value (it starts with a 20x20 pixel grid size)


‚Ä¢ click on "Apply"


‚Ä¢ a new Pixelate fill is added to your shape



tip : you can edit min, max and current Slider values.
plugins.tagline: Apply Mosaic & Pixelate | value in 1-100

tip : you can edit min, max and current Slider values.

plugins.name: Deep Focus | A Pomodoro Timer that Counts Frames
plugins.description:
Deep Focus is this beautiful tool for Figma users, designed to enhance concentration and productivity.


This focus timer does more than just track time; it also counts the number of frames you create during each session.


Tailored for designers seeking to quantify their creative output, Deep Focus helps you maintain concentration, track your progress, and boost your efficiency.


Whether you're working on complex projects or managing daily tasks, Deep Focus is your companion for achieving more in every session.
plugins.tagline: A Focus Timer That Counts the Number of Frames Every Pomodoro Session

plugins.name: URL2Design
plugins.description:
Ever wanted to quickly import an existing website's design into Figma? We felt the same, that's why we made URL2Design. Now, you can easily pull websites into Figma and start tweaking it, jumpstarting the creative process. 


URL2Design, your shortcut from the web straight into Figma elements. ‚ú®


Here‚Äôs how it works:


  1. Spot & Copy: Find a website that sparks inspiration for you or your client.
  2. Paste & Generate: Paste the link into URL2Design Figma Plugin
  3. Tweak: Instantly get the Figma elements, ready for you to tweak it.


Why URL2Design?


‚åõTime-Saver: What used to take hours of designing from scratch, now takes less than 10 minutes.

üß™Freedom to Experiment: Start with a solid base and let your creativity flow, tweaking as you see fit (or your client‚Äôs fit)

‚ö°Efficiency Boost: Spend less time recreating and more time refining and innovating.


We hope this tool brings you closer to your efficient design workflow. Happy designing! 

Curious about the tech? It‚Äôs made with love by Symph.
plugins.tagline: URL2Design

plugins.name: Empty States: Perfect SVG Illustrations
plugins.description:
Empty States: Perfect SVG Illustrations


Empty States is your go-to Figma plugin for effortlessly finding and integrating free, beautifully crafted empty state illustrations in SVG format. Whether you're designing for onboarding, no-content pages, or error states, this plugin provides high-quality visuals at your fingertips, helping you communicate ideas and elevate your UI design.


Say goodbye to blank screens and hello to meaningful placeholders. With EmptyStates, adding personality to your product has never been easier.


üëâ How to use EmptyStates:


  1. Open the plugin in Figma.
  2. Search for your desired empty state illustration.
  3. Insert the SVG directly into your design.
  4. Voil√†! You've filled the void with style.

accepted.name: Superfiles
accepted.description: Built with love by Team Superfiles ‚Äì 6 years of design magic, now packed into a plugin bundle that makes your Figma flow super. Welcome to effortless design.

plugins.tagline: Illustrations for Every Empty Moment - Add Empty States illustration in one click

plugins.name: Style Merger
plugins.description:
Style Merger allows you apply multiple text styles to a text layer automatically based on language character sets.


Supported character sets:

  • English
  • Korean (Hangul/Hanja)
  • Japanese(Hiragana/Katakana/Kanji)
  • Chinese (Hanzi)
  • Emoji


How to use:

  • Create a local text style for each language
  • Toggle languages and set the style to apply for each language
  • Press the 'Apply styles' button while a text layer is selected to apply all text styles


Save presets:

  • Toggle and select styles on the "Styles" tab
  • From the "Settings" tab input the name of your preset and save it via the "+" button.


Load presets:

  • From the "Settings" tab press the load button to load styles from a previously saved preset.


Coming Soon

  • More language character set options
  • Support for remote library text styles
plugins.tagline: Multi-language text styles

plugins.name: DSync
plugins.description:
This plugin helps the designers and developers to automate the process of syncing Figma design system changes straight to the codebase design system.


It is quite useful for the designers to make changes in the design system without notifying developers about each change. Adding 10 new icons in Figma can now be easily transformed to the code as files with one click instead of exporting them manually by the developer. Changing the accent color will not only take effect everywhere it's used in Figma components, but also in the code components just as fast.


At the moment, the plugin works with such design tokens as

  • icons ‚Äî it searches for "COMPONENT" types on a Figma page and returns them in .svg format only
  • colors ‚Äî it searches for "PAINT" types on a Figma page and returns them in .json format
  • typography ‚Äî it searches for "TEST" types on a Figma page and returns them in .json format


For instance, if we run the plugin on the page with icons and send the changes, the PR will be creates with all the new .svg files, which are not in the base branch yet.


Plugin form has several fields which are necessary to be provided:

  • repo name ‚Äî the name of your Github repository with the code design system
  • your Github token ‚Äî here are the instructions of how to create it)
  • owner name ‚Äî your Github nickname if you own the repo or the name of the company
  • head branch ‚Äî the name of the branch where you make the changes to your design system
  • base branch ‚Äî the name of the base branch where you are to pull your changes


By pushing the "Sync" button it pushes all found token styles to the head branch of the provided repo and creates a pull request to the main branch.


üì© Do not hesitate to suggest any additional functionality if you think the plugin might be helpful to you!

22395.name: DSync
22395.description:

It is quite useful for the designers to make changes in the design system without notifying developers about each change. Adding 10 new icons in Figma can now be easily transformed to the code as files with one click instead of exporting them manually by the developer. Changing the accent color will not only take effect everywhere it's used in Figma components, but also in the code components just as fast.


At the moment, the plugin works with such design tokens as

  • icons ‚Äî it searches for "COMPONENT" types on a Figma page and returns them in .svg format only
  • colors ‚Äî it searches for "PAINT" types on a Figma page and returns them in .json format
  • typography ‚Äî it searches for "TEST" types on a Figma page and returns them in .json format


For instance, if we run the plugin on the page with icons and send the changes, the PR will be creates with all the new .svg files, which are not in the base branch yet.


Plugin form has several fields which are necessary to be provided:

  • repo name ‚Äî the name of your Github repository with the code design system
  • your Github token ‚Äî here are the instructions of how to create it)
  • owner name ‚Äî your Github nickname if you own the repo or the name of the company
  • head branch ‚Äî the name of the branch where you make the changes to your design system
  • base branch ‚Äî the name of the base branch where you are to pull your changes


By pushing the "Sync" button it pushes all found token styles to the head branch of the provided repo and creates a pull request to the main branch.


üì© Do not hesitate to suggest any additional functionality if you think the plugin might be helpful to you!

plugins.name: BestPrice.gr
plugins.description:
This plugin will populate the selected layers with product-related data (title, price and image), based on your query.

How it works:

Select layers (text or rects).

- All text layers containing $ or ‚Ç¨ will be filled with product prices.
All text layers named "descr" or "description" will be populated with product descriptions, if available.
- All text layers that are not handled as "price layers" will be filled with product tiles.
- Rects wil be filled with product covers.

Notes:
1. Too small layers are ignored.
2. Locked layers are ignored.
3. Rects without (visible) fills are ignored.

accepted.name: BestPrice
accepted.description: The human-centric ecosystem connnecting consumers, retailers and brands.

plugins.name: User Flows Magic
plugins.description:
User Flows Magic ‚Äì Create User Flows in FigJam Instantly!

Want to test it right away? Just copy the example we‚Äôve provided here and copy it to the plugin to see it in action instantly! üöÄ


Stop spending hours creating user flows manually! With User Flows Magic, simply generate your flow in ChatGPT (our custom GPT), copy the code, and paste it into FigJam. Done in seconds!


üí° How it Works:

  1. Use User Flows Magic GPT to generate your custom user flow.
  2. Copy the generated code (it‚Äôs all set up and ready to use!).
  3. Paste it into the User Flows Magic plugin in FigJam.
  4. Boom‚Äîyour flow is instantly ready to edit and collaborate!

plugins.name: Select Siblings in Auto-Layout
plugins.description:
A plugin that quickly selects elements inside auto-layout frames. It allows to pick just one element and then expand the selection in numerous ways. Can be useful when dealing with long lists of layers, such as news feeds, chat interfaces and many more.


Supports the commands listed below:


Select to the Beginning

Selects all the elements located before a selected one (i. e., those positioned above or to the left of the element in an auto-layout frame).


Select to the End

Similarly, expands a selection so as it will include the elements located after a selected one (positioned below or to the right of the element).


Select Between Elements

Selects all elements located between the two nodes that have been already selected.


Expand a Selection Backward

Adds the previous element to a selection.


Expand a Selection Forward

Similarly, adds the next one.


Select the First

Basically, selects the first element in a list.


Select the Last

Does the same, but with the last element.
plugins.tagline: Quickly select elements on the same level of hierarchy

48617.name: Select Siblings in Auto-Layout
48617.description:
A plugin that quickly selects elements inside auto-layout frames. It allows to pick just one element and then expand the selection in numerous ways. Can be useful when dealing with long lists of layers, such as news feeds, chat interfaces and many more.


Supports the commands listed below:


Select to the Beginning

Selects all the elements located before a selected one (i. e., those positioned above or to the left of the element in an auto-layout frame).


Select to the End

Similarly, expands a selection so as it will include the elements located after a selected one (positioned below or to the right of the element).


Select Between Elements

Selects all elements located between the two nodes that have been already selected.


Expand a Selection Backward

Adds the previous element to a selection.


Expand a Selection Forward

Similarly, adds the next one.


Select the First

Basically, selects the first element in a list.


Select the Last

Does the same, but with the last element.
48617.release_notes: Add the Select Between Elements command
48617.tagline: Quickly select elements on the same level of hierarchy

plugins.name: CSV to ChArt
plugins.description:
CSV to ChArt ‚Äì Convert CSV Data into Beautiful Auto Layout Bar Charts in Figma

CSV to ChArt is a powerful and easy-to-use Figma plugin that turns your raw CSV data into stunning bar charts‚Äîautomatically formatted using Figma's Auto Layout. Whether you're a designer, data analyst, or product manager, this plugin lets you visualize tabular data in seconds‚Äîdirectly inside your Figma designs.


Key Features:

CSV to Chart Conversion ‚Äì Paste your comma- or tab-separated values and instantly generate clean, scalable bar charts.


Auto Layout Ready ‚Äì Charts are built using Figma‚Äôs Auto Layout for maximum flexibility and easy editing.


Design Friendly ‚Äì Customizable bars and labels to match your project‚Äôs style.


Fast Prototyping ‚Äì Save hours on manually building charts from tables.


Works with city data, survey results, analytics exports, and more.


Who is this for?

Perfect for designers, UX researchers, product teams, and anyone who presents data in Figma‚Äîwithout switching between tools like Excel or Google Sheets.
plugins.tagline: CSV ‚Üí Chart with Auto Layout

plugins.name: Page Status
plugins.description:
Getting Started:

  • The plugin will automatically display the current page you are on
  • Select an emoji from the dropdown.
  • Change the page status
  • Simply select another page and repeat the process
  • Select the first item in the dropdown to remove the status


Changing status will add the selected emoji plus a pipe symbol "|" as a prefix to your page name. You can still edit your page names as you normally would.


Note: this plugin uses the pipe symbol as a delimiter. Changing the name may affect the plugins ability to recognise the current status.


The plugin remains open as you flip between your pages to change statuses. Close it whenever you want.


Settings

The plugin supports up to 8 custom emojis and corresponding statuses. Click on Settings to review the panel and update any of the fields as you wish.


Free

This plugin is free!
plugins.tagline: Quickly indicate to your team the status of the pages you are working on

The plugin remains open as you flip between your pages to change statuses. Close it whenever you want.

plugins.name: Upbuilder.ai | Figma to Webflow, Elementor, Bricks, HTML/CSS
plugins.description:
UpBuilder (Beta)


UpBuilder is an AI-powered Figma plugin that converts your designs into clean code - simple as that. Currently free while in beta!


No need for auto layout - the AI creates the flex and grid layout for you.


What it does

- Turns your Figma designs into real, working code

- Supports Webflow, HTML/CSS.

- Elementor, Bricks and more platforms coming very soon


How to use it

1. Select your design frame

2. Click export

3. Wait a few seconds while it processes and extracts the data

4. You'll be redirected to the project page while the code processes

5. Choose your preferred platform to export (Webflow, HTML/CSS, etc.)

6. Done!


Note: Processing time depends on your design size - bigger designs might take a more time to process.


For more info, visit: https://upbuilder.ai/
plugins.tagline: Free AI Figma to Code Converter - Export to Webflow, Elementor, Bricks, and More

plugins.name: StilTausch ‚ú∑ Swap styles with variables
plugins.description:
StilTausch is a Figma plugin that allows you to swap styles with variables.


‚ö†Ô∏è Restrictions

1. This plugin works only with team libraries, which means you need to publish your library before you can swap styles.

2. The plugin swaps only color styles.

3. Doesn't swap styles on INSTANCE components.


Links

  • Docs and the repo üìñ
  • Preview of how it works üé•


Features

  • Run the plugin for the current page or entire file
  • Swap all styles automatically
  • Swap manually by names


Feedback

If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to leave a comment here or create an issue on GitHub.

accepted.name: Pavel Laptev

plugins.name: Huge Avatars
plugins.description:
A massive, high-quality library of avatars designed to supercharge your workflow.


Huge Avatars delivers on its name with over 180 ready-to-use profile pictures for your designs. But it's not just about quantity‚Äîthis library is organized into three unique and fun styles to perfectly match your project's vibe.


Stop wasting time searching for placeholders. With a single click, fill any shape with a realistic photo, a modern 3D character, or a classic cartoon avatar.


Key Features:


A Huge Library: Get instant access to 180+ high-quality avatars so you never run out of options.

Three Unique Styles: Don't settle for one look. Choose from Realistic Photos, 3D Characters, and Simpsons-style Avatars.

One-Click Apply: Select a shape and click any avatar to instantly apply it.

Bulk Replace: Populate multiple selected layers with random avatars from the current category using the "Replace All" button.

Super Fast & Lightweight: Built with lazy loading to ensure the plugin opens and runs quickly without slowing you down.

Perfect for mockups, user personas, contact lists, testimonial sections, and UI design presentations.


Install Huge Avatars and instantly upgrade your design mockups!

accepted.name: OThmane Mdidet
accepted.description: Freelance designer working globally (remotely), and creating meaningful and purpose driven experiences for screens.

plugins.tagline: A huge library of avatars, in every style

Key Features:


A Huge Library: Get instant access to 180+ high-quality avatars so you never run out of options.

Three Unique Styles: Don't settle for one look. Choose from Realistic Photos, 3D Characters, and Simpsons-style Avatars.

One-Click Apply: Select a shape and click any avatar to instantly apply it.

Bulk Replace: Populate multiple selected layers with random avatars from the current category using the "Replace All" button.

Super Fast & Lightweight: Built with lazy loading to ensure the plugin opens and runs quickly without slowing you down.

Perfect for mockups, user personas, contact lists, testimonial sections, and UI design presentations.


Install Huge Avatars and instantly upgrade your design mockups!
138537.release_notes:
What's New

Huge Library of Avatars: Instantly access over 180 high-quality avatars so you never have to search for placeholders again.

Three Unique Styles: Choose the perfect vibe for your project with three distinct packs: Realistic Photos, 3D Characters, and Simpsons-style.

One-Click Apply: Select any shape and click an avatar to apply it instantly.
Bulk Populate: Use the "Replace All" button to fill multiple selected layers with random avatars from the current category.

Super Fast Performance: The plugin uses lazy loading to open instantly and run smoothly.
138537.tagline: A huge library of avatars, in every style

plugins.name: IconSet Maker
plugins.description:
This plugin allows users to create icon component sets from their icons with just one click. Easily specify custom sizes and styles for your icons. Edit the sizes field by separating values with commas, and name your icons to define different styles.


Simplify your design workflow and achieve perfectly scaled and styled icon sets quickly and efficiently.
plugins.tagline: Create Icon Sets from Icons Effortlessly with Custom Sizes

plugins.name: AI Text Generator
plugins.description:
AI Text Generator is an AI-powered plugin designed to streamline the text generation and filling process in Figma.


Key Benefits:

  1. Automatic Text Filling: AI Text Generator intelligently identifies text fields within any selected frame and fills them with relevant content in seconds.
  2. Realistic Content: The plugin generates believable, context-specific text, ideal for mockups, prototypes, and presentations.
  3. Time-Saving: Eliminate the need for manual text entry. With just one click, all text fields are populated, significantly boosting your design efficiency.


Whether you're designing for presentations or building prototypes, AI Text Generator enhances your workflow, enabling you to create lifelike previews effortlessly.

plugins.name: word2word translate
plugins.description:
When you need a translation, do you still replace everything manually?

This plugin allow you to easily replace characters if you have a parallel translation list.


  1. Create a parallel translation list.(The text in the list has to be an exact match to the text in the design file.)
  2. Upload the CSV file to the plug-in.
  3. Press "Start" :)


  • We have confirmed that it works with comma-separated UTF-8 csv files. (Using Microsoft Excel is highly recommended.)
  • This plug-in is currently under development and improvements will be considered as needed.

32571.name: word2word translate
32571.description:
When you need a translation, do you still replace everything manually?

This plugin allow you to easily replace characters if you have a parallel translation list.


  1. Create a parallel translation list.(The text in the list has to be an exact match to the text in the design file.)
  2. Upload the CSV file to the plug-in.
  3. Press "Start" :)


  • We have confirmed that it works with comma-separated UTF-8 csv files. (Using Microsoft Excel is highly recommended.)
  • This plug-in is currently under development and improvements will be considered as needed.

plugins.name: Bgwrap - Background Remover
plugins.description:
BGWrap is your fast and reliable background remover built for speed and precision. Remove backgrounds from individual or bulk images with just a click. Whether you're preparing product photos, social media visuals, or clean design assets, BGWrap delivers clean cutouts that keep your subject sharp and distraction-free.


Supports batch background removal


High-accuracy subject detection


Ideal for eCommerce, marketing, and design workflows


Simple, seamless, and ready to use
plugins.tagline: Remove Backgrounds. Retain Clarity. Instantly.
